&reftitle.install;
To install the mysqli extension for PHP use the --with-mysqli[=mysql_config path] configuration option (where mysql_config represents the location of the mysql_config program which comes with MySQL 4.1) and disable the standard mysql extension using the --without-mysql configuration option. If you would like to install the standard mysql extension along with the mysqli extension, the bundled libmysql library cannot be used. Instead, you must use the client libraries installed by MySQL for versions below 4.1. This will force PHP to use the client libraries installed by MySQL, avoiding any conflicts.
